notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: J.N., N.N. and J.E. interpreted the data and were responsible for the overall study design. N.N. and J.E. were responsible for the overall project coordination. H.R., B.C., N.N., P.K., P.D., A.A., M.C. were medically and organizationally responsible for the clinical sites and collected key epidemiological data of the study participants. J.N., N.R.F., N.N. and J.E. analyzed the data and contributed in statistical analyses. J.N. and J.E. wrote the manuscript. All authors read and approved the manuscript.
